reviewText: Well worth the money. Loved it. Explained everything A to Z. A great ending.( Big Fish). Will watch over and over.
This well done video is a great intro to this technique. I've just finished it and can't wait to hit the rivers and catch some steelies.

A well done video where a lot of information is shared.  What the author is using for gear and what he says to use are two different matters, however.  All in all, well worth the money.  The first two times I tried the technique produced a pair of limits!
If you want to know how to Bobber Dog this is THE DVD for you. Good attention to the details with generous insights into the reasoning behind gear selection and river technique.
